articles.description: Domestic and global investors, retail investors, and HNIs are buying, and supply has not appeared in the secondary market sale, QIPs, OFS, nor IPOs. The buying has overwhelmed selling, but market regulation works, and selling is inevitable. The Indian market …
articles.content: Nilesh Shah, MD, Kotak AMC, says today we have seen buying from domestic investors, global investors, retail and HNIs and the supply has not emerged. No big IPOs, no QIPs, no OFS, no secondary market… [+4753 chars]

articles.title: Dipan Mehta on why Page Industries is falling & what could be the multibaggers in next 7-8 years - The Economic Times
articles.description: Elixir Equities Director, Dipan Mehta, argues that new age companies such as Zomato, Policy Bazaar, Nykaa, and Paytm are stocks of the decade of the 2030s and could be huge multibaggers over the next 5-10 years. However, these companies are still in their inv…
articles.content: Dipan Mehta, Director, Elixir Equities, says we are approaching the new age companies just as you buy options and with a very long term view like 5-10 years or so. The likes of Zomato, Policy Bazaar,… [+7202 chars]
